meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6544.

td.p: Colby Burnett, a high school world history teacher from Chicago, Illinois
David Menchaca, a law student originally from Long Beach, California
Joel Pool, a real estate developer from Oakland, California

tr.td: GREAT BRITON
TIE ONE
"TAS"-MANIA
AISLE OF MAN
CANARIES
SURROUNDED BY WATER
(Alex: You have to name the surrounding body of water for us.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'A tramp abroad, he moved to the U.S. in 1913, left for Europe in the \'50s & was back in the U.S. in 1972 for an honorary Oscar')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: A tramp abroad, he moved to the U.S. in 1913, left for Europe in the '50s & was back in the U.S. in 1972 for an honorary Oscar
